name: In re ADVANCED COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGY, SPECIAL ASSIGNMENT SCHEDULE FOR the 38TH JUDICIAL DISTRICT

judges: Before: GAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and LAMB, JJ.
parties: In re ADVANCED COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGY, SPECIAL ASSIGNMENT SCHEDULE FOR the 38TH JUDICIAL DISTRICT.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of October, 2003, the Petition for Review and/or Exercise of King’s Bench Remedy is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Samuel C. Stetton, West Chester, for Kowal, Dist. Justice John L., et ah, Petitioners.
Howard M. Holmes, A. Taylor Williams, Philadelphia, for S. Gerald Corso, Respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
834 A.2d 514
In re ADVANCED COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGY, SPECIAL ASSIGNMENT SCHEDULE FOR the 38TH JUDICIAL DISTRICT.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 21, 2003.
Samuel C. Stetton, West Chester, for Kowal, Dist. Justice John L., et ah, Petitioners.
Howard M. Holmes, A. Taylor Williams, Philadelphia, for S. Gerald Corso, Respondent.
Before: GAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and LAMB, JJ.
